list_definition.definition: a part of a plant growing from the side of a stem, usually green, flat and thin, but of various shapes depending on the plant

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Many trees lose their leaves in autumn.

list_definition.definition: something thin like a leaf, especially the page of a book

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Several leaves had been torn out of the book.

list_definition.definition: an extra part of a table, either attached to one side with a hinge or added to the centre when the two ends are apart.
